class.name: LargeTexture
class.brief_description: A Texture capable of storing many smaller Textures with offsets.
class.description: A Texture capable of storing many smaller Textures with offsets. You can dynamically add pieces([Texture]) to this [code]LargeTexture[/code] using different offsets.

method.name: add_piece
method.description: Add another [Texture] to this [code]LargeTexture[/code], starting on offset "ofs".

method.name: get_piece_count
method.description: Returns the number of pieces currently in this [code]LargeTexture[/code].

method.name: get_piece_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the piece with index "idx".

method.name: get_piece_texture
method.description: Returns the [Texture] of the piece with index "idx".

method.name: set_piece_offset
method.description: Sets the offset of the piece with index "idx" to "ofs".

method.name: set_piece_texture
method.description: Sets the [Texture] of the piece with index "idx" to "ofs".
